twitch_info.title: I wanna Classic - VVVVVV - Impossible Difficulty (Deathless) - Audio Delay Bug
twitch_info.description:
Successful, yay! Audio desync bug occurred on OBS somehow, making the audio being delayed.
The audio delay is apparently 901.5 ms behind. This has been fixed locally for the master compiled impossible difficulties video I will be making in the future. The fix was to a 902 ms audio offset, introducing a 0.5 ms audio delay as shotcut video editor will not do microseconds.

message.body: nah it's just I expect losing flip to happenlater every time
